description:
✅ Join the discussion on "Unveiling Bias in NLP Systems" at the #Py4AI conference with Amanda Cercas Curry - PostDoc @UniBocconi - for an eye-opening exploration into the challenges and solutions surrounding bias in NLP.

#NLP #biasinAI #techtalks #ethic #ethicalai #Py4AI #techconference
title: Unveiling Bias in NLP Systems
